title: Can't purchase any item (showing unknown error)
body:
Hallo guys,

Every week I am collecting the candies for 200IP but this error pops up when I am trying to puchase them or any other item: http://i.imgur.com/8mOY7OI.jpg

And when I click on another tab in the shop such as _**accesories**_ or _**gameplay**_, this error will pop up instead: http://i.imgur.com/0MdHsPB.jpg

Are the servers down or is it problem in my LoL folder somewhere ?

replies.body:
I wasn't able to find any records or store issues within the last few days, so I suspect this is something caused by a local configuration. I recommend working through the steps found outlined in our [**Store Issues Guide**](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/202536660), as they commonly resolve these sorts of problems.

Please let me know if those steps worked for you~ ^.^
